content:
The pre -trial investigation into the deputy of the Semenovsk city council of Chernihiv region, which after the mobilization, evaded military service with the assistance of the head of the unit.

About thisreported March 29State Bureau of Investigation.

According to the department, it was found that the deputy was mobilized after the Russian invasion began, but for 5 months did not actually perform the duties of military service.

His immediate chief did not respond to the absence of a subordinate serviceman and vice versa, he was recorded in the official documentation that he seems to be serving in border outfits.

At the same time, the deputy illegally received the financial support of the military and special allowances for more than 157 thousand hryvnias.

He is accused of evading the duties of military service and fraud (Part 4 of Article 409, Part 2 of Article 190 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine).

The sanction of the article provides for imprisonment for up to 10 years.

The materials of the pre -trial investigation against the head of the deputy who covered his criminal acts were allocated to separate proceedings. Currently, criminal proceedings have been completed and sent to court.

The divisor is accused of fake official (Part 1 of Article 366), abuse of power or office (Part 1 of Article 364), in a criminal offense for the evasion of military service (Part 5 of Article 27, Part 4 of Part. 409). The sanction of the article provides for imprisonment for up to 10 years.

Asreported the armyinform, in the Nikolaev area returned to fighters payments lost because of negligence officials.
